content: Hey all, I am new to Rust (still learning the basic concepts) but not so new to programming (Python, Java, C#, Haxe). Always looking to connect and learn more. Right now though I am looking for some good places that have Rust exercises for me to practice on. Either way thanks for having a cool place to hang out.
exercism.io was quite nice (but I think they're lacking reviewers) and Advent of Code is pretty popular these days

Laurențiu Nicola said:

exercism.io was quite nice (but I think they're lacking reviewers) and Advent of Code is pretty popular these days

I forgot about Advent of Code, I think this is closer to what i was looking for. Thank you!.

Hello @Rain
You can check Rustlings https://github.com/rust-lang/rustlings
